Line1.2CDEB: The spell is old. Intricate. But I have another familiar, Mochrann, who is suitable for the task.
Line3.2CDEB: Mochrann will suppress the wild magic. Please protect him. At my age, I canâ€™t afford to trade any more of my life essence to create a familiar.
Line5.2CDEB: Keep up your guard. I expect there will be trouble.
